title: Caihong Gui
synopsis: A rainbow fell on a little turtle's egg, and the egg miraculously hatched a little turtle with a rainbow-patterned back shell, which was unusual. And it was this extraordinary that when Xiao Caihong was born, she was treated as a little monster. His mother didn't recognize it, she was alone and lived a life of nomadism. He has experienced many sad things, but he also made many friends like the painter little raccoon. In the end, Rainbow sacrificed his bright colors on his back to help the raccoon realize his wish for a painting exhibition. Although the rainbow lost its bright and beautiful colors, it finally returned to the mother he missed day and night.(translated from bilibili)
